name: avatarsGetBrowser
description: You can use this endpoint to show different browser icons to your users. The code argument receives the browser code as it appears in your user /account/sessions endpoint. Use width, height and quality arguments to change the output settings.

width.description: Image width. Pass an integer between 0 to 2000. Defaults to 100.

height.description: Image height. Pass an integer between 0 to 2000. Defaults to 100.

quality.description: Image quality. Pass an integer between 0 to 100. Defaults to 100.
